WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE  10  
BACKGROUND AND OVERVIEW
The results of this survey greatly improved understanding of how to make the WHO Safe Child-
birth Checklist most effective in improving care for mothers and newborns in settings around
